# AiVerse - AI Creative Platform
# https://llmstxt.org/

> AiVerse is an AI-powered creative platform that enables users to generate images, videos, and chat with AI assistants. Available as a Telegram Mini App and web application.

## About AiVerse

AiVerse is a next-generation AI creative suite designed for content creators, artists, and anyone looking to explore artificial intelligence capabilities. Our platform combines multiple AI technologies into one seamless experience.

## Core Features

### AI Image Generation
- Generate stunning images from text prompts
- Multiple AI models including FLUX, GPT-Image, and more
- Style customization and advanced parameters
- High-resolution outputs up to 4K

### AI Video Generation
- Create videos from text descriptions
- Support for Seedance, Kling, and other video models
- Transform images to videos
- Professional quality video exports

### AI Chat Assistants
- Conversational AI powered by GPT-4, Claude, and DeepSeek
- Intelligent responses and creative assistance
- Multi-language support (English, Russian, Spanish, French, German, Arabic)
- Context-aware conversations

### Community & Rewards
- Daily bonuses and engagement rewards
- Referral program for users
- Community challenges and events
- Achievement system with spin rewards

## Technical Information

- **Website**: https://www.aiverseapp.net
- **Telegram Bot**: @aiversebot
- **Contact**: contact@aiverseapp.net
- **Supported Languages**: English, Russian, Spanish, French, German, Arabic

## Pages

- [Home](https://www.aiverseapp.net/)
- [Login](https://www.aiverseapp.net/login)
- [Studio](https://www.aiverseapp.net/studio)
- [Privacy Policy](https://www.aiverseapp.net/privacy)
- [Terms of Service](https://www.aiverseapp.net/terms)

## API Access

AiVerse provides AI generation capabilities through the Telegram Mini App platform. Direct API access is not currently available for external developers.

## Contact

For partnerships, support, or inquiries:
- Email: contact@aiverseapp.net
- Telegram: @aiversebot
